name: chicken
description: Juicy sweet & sour baked chicken, enough for a big meal or 2 small meals.

name: mac and cheese with ham
description: Cheesy mac and cheese with ham. There should be enough for 4 portions, but it's very fattening so I would eat it as a treat and maybe freeze the rest.

name: pizza
description: Extra domino's cheese pizza with green peppers. Barely touched the pizza, ended up buying way too much. There are 6 slices left, first come first served.

name: plantain
description: Delicious plantain fried in olive oil. This is more of a side dish than a meal but if u eat the whole bowl (plz bring a container) it will fill you right up!

name: salad in a jar
description: SUPER healthy, salad kitt. Simply empty the jar into a big bowl before serving and add salad dressing. This is 100% vegan!

name: salmon
description: Fresh salmon, baked today. We have 3 extra pieces so all you need is some rice or something and your meal is good to go.

name: spaghetti
description: Homecooked spaghetti for two, please bring your own container and message me to discuss the pickup details
